title: The Death of Allegory objects that sit quietly

content.prompt: As used in line 24, the phrase “objects that sit quietly” emphasizes the speaker’s point that objects like the binoculars and the money clip differ from allegorical figures because they lack a

choices.label: larger and physically impressive scale of size
stronger and highly memorable use of colors

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain the function of specific words and phrases in a text.
